panels.description:
For each node computed as:
`histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (le) (irate(kv_cmd_duration_seconds_bucket{opcode=~"GET|GAT"}[10m])))`
panels.title: Percentile GET or GAT latencies

panels.description:
For each node computed as:
`topk(5, sum by (opcode) (kv_cmd_duration_seconds_count))`
panels.title: Top Non-DCP Opcodes

panels.description:
The number of deleted documents, converted into tombstones, every minute

kv_ep_total_del_items
panels.title: Rate of Deletes

panels.description:
Minimum key count that bloom filter will accomodate

kv_ep_bfilter_key_count
panels.title: Size of Key

panels.description:
Total number of items in disk queue

kv_ep_diskqueue_items
panels.title: Disk Queue Items

panels.description:
Total memory used by disk queue, in bytes

kv_ep_diskqueue_memory_bytes
panels.title: Disk Queue Memory Usage

panels.description:
KV service CPU Utilization of all cores summed up, in percent

sysproc_cpu_utilization{proc="memcached"}
panels.title: KV CPU Utilization

panels.description:
Number of failed KV operations

kv_ops_failed
panels.title: Failed KV Operations

panels.description:
KV service uptime in seconds

kv_uptime_seconds
panels.title: KV Uptime

panels.description:
Memory usage by the KV service, in bytes

sysproc_mem_resident{proc="memcached"}
panels.title: KV Memory Usage

panels.description:
Memory of items in all checkpoints, in bytes

kv_ep_checkpoint_memory_bytes
panels.title: Checkpoint Memory Size

panels.description:
Whether the defragmenter is enabled or not

kv_ep_defragmenter_enabled
panels.title: Defragmenter Enabled

panels.description:
How often defragmenter task should run, in seconds

kv_ep_defragmenter_interval
panels.title: Defragmenter Interval

panels.description:
Memory usage by the KV service, in bytes

sysproc_mem_resident{proc="memcached"}
panels.title: KV Memory Usage

panels.description:
Total number of backoff events

kv_dcp_backoff
panels.title: Backoff Events

panels.description:
Total items remaining to be sent

kv_dcp_items_remaining
panels.title: Remaining Items

targets.expr: sum(kv_num_vbuckets{state="active"}) by (bucket) + sum(kv_num_vbuckets{state="replica"}) by (bucket) + sum(kv_num_vbuckets{state="pending"}) by (bucket)

panels.description:
Memory used per collection in bytes

kv_collection_mem_used_bytes
panels.title: Memory Used by Collection

panels.description:
Operations run on a particular collection

kv_collection_ops
panels.title: Operations Run on Collection

panels.description:
Connections that have ever been opened

kv_total_connections
panels.title: Connections delta
